author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Put the caster sugar, cardamom pods and water in a pan. Stir over a gentle heat until the sugar has dissolved. Take off the heat and allow to cool before adding the lime zest. Mix and pour over the pineapple chunks or rings.
ingredients: 225g/8oz caster sugar,  8 green cardamom pods, seeds removed and crushed,  150ml/5¼fl oz water,  150ml/5¼fl oz lime juice,  1 tbsp grated lime zest or to taste,  pineapple chunks or rings
